item.title: Benchmarking Temporal Reasoning and Alignment Across Chinese Dynasties
item.description: CTM: A new benchmark for assessing temporal reasoning in LLMs across Chinese dynastic history.

item.title: Number it: Temporal Grounding Videos like Flipping Manga
item.description: Boosting video temporal grounding, NumPro empowers Vid-LLMs by adding frame numbers, making temporal localization as easy as flipping through manga.

item.title: Navigating the Unknown: A Chat-Based Collaborative Interface for Personalized Exploratory Tasks
item.description: Collaborative Assistant for Personalized Exploration (CARE) enhances LLM chatbots for exploratory tasks by combining a multi-agent framework with a structured interface, delivering tailored solutions …
